item.description:
Now the weather is getting warmer we are ready for some outdoor
activities. Please join us for the short hike in Blue Hill. This Red Dot trail is rated pretty easy and short...it takes about less than a half hour up and less than a half hour down. There will be a nice view at the top.....from there we can check out the Weather Observation Center. It costs about $3 per person to get into the observation tower if you would like to enter.


Although it is a short hike, please wear comfortable clothes, sneaker is ok since is short distance. Hiking boot is great if you have a pair. Bring a bottle of water and some snacks. I will bring OFF spray...share with you....in case there are bugs. After the hike, we may go for coffee break or dinner. I will provide my cell phone # to those that RSVP in case you get lost prior to meeting up.

We are going to meet at Trailside Museum parking lot at about 2 PM.
Trailside Museum
1904 Canton Ave
Milton, MA 02186
(617) 333-0690

Directions: take 93 south Exit 2B, your are in in Canton Ave (route 138) already...go straight through the first set of light and less than 2 minutes...the museum and parking lot is on your right.

hope you can join us then,

Susan
item.why: Time for a fun outdoor activity....this trail is very easy and short.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Hiking in Blue Hill on postponed to 6/1/08 Sunday
